methods.name: GetPredefinedMessagesAsync
methods.generated_summary: Retrieve predefined messages asynchronously and return them as response models.

params_list.name: userId
params_list.param_desc: The ID of the user who is making the request.

params_list.name: schoolIds
params_list.param_desc: A list of IDs representing the schools for which predefined messages need to be retrieved.

params_list.name: methodName
params_list.param_desc: The name of the method being called, in this case 'GetPredefinedMessagesAsync'.

params_list.name: methodPurpose
params_list.param_desc: The purpose of the method 'GetPredefinedMessagesAsync' is to retrieve predefined messages asynchronously and return them as response models.

methods.name: GetPredefinedMessageContentByIdAsync
methods.generated_summary: Retrieve the predefined message content by its ID asynchronously.

params_list.name: id
params_list.param_desc: The ID of the predefined message content to be retrieved.

params_list.name: userId
params_list.param_desc: The ID of the user who is requesting the predefined message content.

params_list.name: schoolIds
params_list.param_desc: A list of IDs representing the schools for which the predefined message content is requested.
